entry.title: Lê Thị Tuyết Mai (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that diplomat Lê Thị Tuyết Mai (pictured) studied at three different universities in three different countries?

entry.title: Happenings Ten Years Time Ago (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the feedback sounds in the Yardbirds' "Happenings Ten Years Time Ago" were later "swiped" by Jimi Hendrix?

entry.title: Farah (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the first day of filming of the psychological thriller Farah coincided with the beginning of the 2019 Lebanese protests?

entry.title: Roosevelt station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Douglas branch's Roosevelt station went from having more than 700,000 riders in 1910 to only 50,000 in 1950?

entry.title: Nasser Abu Hamid (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Nasser Abu Hamid had five brothers serving life sentences in addition to him?

entry.title: 2022 Quick Lane Bowl (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the 2022 Quick Lane Bowl had to use a substitute referee after the original referee's flight was canceled?

entry.title: Robert Spencer Finkbine (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Robert Spencer Finkbine spent 13 years as the superintendent of construction of the Iowa State Capitol?

entry.title: Among Us VR (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the developers of Among Us VR said that the game could have been too spooky?
